Text:
Thanks for this 
but the file names are really annoying and unorganised 
and most of this ain't even indie :/ 
sex pistols is punk :/

I didn't compile the CD blame Ministry of Sound for that

The MP3's are all ID tagged so the file name shouldnt be of any concern (just set your explorer to show title/artist etc)

And you can always go buy if it isn't good enough??
